flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user calls out its underlings to make a living shield, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.platinum: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
